item.description:
We start @ 7pm. I open the door @ 6:45pm.
After 7:15 is too late.

Tournament:
Buy in: $60 --- 10,000T
Rounds are 15 min.
There are no rebuys.

WANT TO PLAY FOR MORE MONEY?
HIGH ROLLERS CAN PUT IN AN EXTRA $50. THE LAST PLAYER TO BUST FROM HIGH ROLLER POOL WINS HIGH ROLLER POOL.
